body_html:
We're considering removing the distribution dashboard entirely, because the histogram dashboard is a superior view of the same information. The new distribution dashboard is the same as the old histogram dashboard.

Will try to decide this soon (ideally before r0.10).

body:
We're considering removing the distribution dashboard entirely, because the histogram dashboard is a superior view of the same information. The new distribution dashboard is the same as the old histogram dashboard. 

Will try to decide this soon (ideally before r0.10).
